meanings.definition: A substance that promotes the formation of tissue.
meanings.sent1: The histogens in the plant fertilizer help the flowers grow.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use histogens to assist in the healing of wounds.
meanings.sent3: The histogens in the soil were like magical potions for the plants.
meanings.sent4: Her encouragement acted as histogens, nurturing his confidence to grow.
meanings.sent5: The histogens worked like building blocks, constructing new tissue in the body.

meanings.definition: Cells that give rise to new tissue growth.
meanings.sent1: Histogens in the body play a crucial role in repairing injuries.
meanings.sent2: The histogens multiplied rapidly to repair the damaged tissue.
meanings.sent3: The histogens were like tiny construction workers, building new tissue structures.
meanings.sent4: Her determination acted as histogens, fueling the growth of her dreams.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the histogens were busy creating new tissue layers.
